import React, { useState } from 'react' import './AskQuestion.css' const AskQuestion = () => { const [ questionTitle, setQuestionTitle ] = useState('') const [ questionBody, setQuestionBody ] = useState('') const [ questionTags, setQuestionTags ] = useState('') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log({ questionTitle, questionBody, questionTags}) } const handleEnter = (e) => { if(e.key === 'Enter'){ setQuestionBody(questionBody + "\n") } } return (

Ask a public Question

{questionBody}

) } export default AskQuestion
